[vc_row equal_height=”” shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column][vc_custom_heading style=”milu-heading” text=”Fate pulls you in different directions” font_size=”24″ min_font_size=”18″ text_align=”left”][vc_column_text]We are Protheme, a small yet dynamic team of web designers and developers that specialize in premium WordPress themes and plugins. We use the latest coding standards with a modern design aesthetic to create high-quality WordPress themes that work for just about any industry or purpose.

What sets us apart is our ability to understand our users and create the best WordPress themes suited for their needs. Our themes are made simple and functional right out of the box, yet offer high customization for more advanced users. Today, over 18,000 people use any one of our WordPress themes to power their websites, from agencies to designers to musicians.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_width=”full” equal_height=”” font_color=”light”][vc_column][vc_gallery slides_per_view=”3″ img_padding=”no” hover_effect=”zoomout” css_animation_each=”true” images=”4011,3988,3983″ css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_width=”small” equal_height=””][vc_column][vc_custom_heading style=”milu-heading” text=”All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream” font_size=”24″ min_font_size=”18″ text_align=”left”][vc_column_text]We are Protheme, a small yet dynamic team of web designers and developers that specialize in premium WordPress themes and plugins. inner self.” font_weight=”400″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_width=”small” equal_height=”” background_type=”image”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading style=”milu-heading” text=”Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground” font_size=”24″ min_font_size=”18″ text_align=”left”][vc_column_text]We are Protheme, a small yet dynamic team of web designers and developers that specialize in premium WordPress themes and plugins. We use the latest coding standards with a modern design aesthetic to create high-quality WordPress themes that work for just about any industry or purpose.

What sets us apart is our ability to understand our users and create the best WordPress themes suited for their needs. Our themes are made simple and functional right out of the box, yet offer high customization for more advanced users.
